entry.title: New FurSquared 2024 schedule released (1.4)
entry.summary:
A new FurSquared 2024 schedule has been released!

–

entry.title: New FurSquared 2024 schedule released (1.3)
entry.summary:
A new FurSquared 2024 schedule has been released!

We have new sessions!

  • “Final Big Expedition”
  • “Fifth Big Expedition”
  • “Your Imagined Furry Fantasy (18+)”
  • “Now This is How You Kill the Con”
  • “Soverign Eclipse”
  • “Soverign Eclipse”
  • “Second Big Expedition”
  • “Your Imagined Furry Fantasy (18+)”
  • “First Big Expedition”
  • “Your Imagined Furry Fantasy (18+)”
  • “Soverign Eclipse”
  • “Steel's Improvised 2-Hour RPG”
  • “Third Big Expedition”
  • “Fourth Big Expedition”

We had to move some sessions, so if you were planning on seeing them, check their new dates or locations:

  • “Sketchbook Swap (18+)” by Rouge (Feb. 23, 2024, 11 p.m. → Feb. 23, 2024, 11:30 p.m.)
  • “Intro to Traditional Irish Music” by Naoise (Feb. 24, 2024, 10 a.m. → Feb. 24, 2024, 9:30 a.m.)
  • “GrindCove: The Movie Premiere ” by Christine Comedian Buninson (Walker → Wright)
  • “So You Want to be a Con Artist ” by Bash the Piñata (Feb. 24, 2024, 2:30 p.m., Pabst → Feb. 24, 2024, 6:30 p.m., Mitchell)
  • “Musical Furpile: The Sequel” by Rhubarb the Bear, Cosmik, Dittman Rat, a fox named coyote, Shallie Dragon, keyotter, Rhubarb the Nidorino, Gale Tazzin, JayLaFlame, $udo Normi (Feb. 25, 2024, 12:30 p.m. → Feb. 25, 2024, 2 p.m.)
  • “Iggy's Pyramid” by Iggy (Feb. 24, 2024, 5:30 p.m. → Feb. 24, 2024, 6 p.m.)

entry.title: New FurSquared 2024 schedule released (1.2)
entry.summary:
A new FurSquared 2024 schedule has been released!

We had to move some sessions, so if you were planning on seeing them, check their new dates or locations:

  • “MST3K (18+)” by Alkali Bismuth (Feb. 23, 2024, 3 a.m. → Feb. 22, 2024, 9 p.m.)
  • “Convention Horror Stories” by Alkali Bismuth (Feb. 23, 2024, 10 p.m. → Feb. 23, 2024, 4 p.m.)

entry.title: New FurSquared 2024 schedule released (1.0)
entry.summary:
The first FurSquared 2024 schedule has been released!

We released our first schedule!
